languages.text: "Благородные семьи тратят силы и время на нелепую борьбу за власть, а должны бы — на укрепление воинской мощи и святой веры".
"Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."
languages.original_text: "Благородные семьи тратят силы и время на нелепую борьбу за власть, а должны бы — на укрепление воинской мощи и святой веры".

traits.locale_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."
"Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."
"Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."
"Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

languages.text: “那些贵族把精力和时间浪费在了荒谬的权力斗争中！这些资源本该用在军事训练与信仰建设上。”
languages.original_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

traits.locale_text: “那些贵族把精力和时间浪费在了荒谬的权力斗争中！这些资源本该用在军事训练与信仰建设上。”

languages.text: « Les familles nobles dépensent bien trop de temps et d'énergie à se chamailler pour le pouvoir alors qu'ils devraient se concentrer sur le renforcement de leur puissance militaire et de la foi. »
languages.original_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

traits.locale_text: « Les familles nobles dépensent bien trop de temps et d'énergie à se chamailler pour le pouvoir alors qu'ils devraient se concentrer sur le renforcement de leur puissance militaire et de la foi. »

languages.text: «Las familias nobles malgastan energía y tiempo en luchas por el poder cuando deberían centrarse en reforzar su poder militar y la fe sagrada».
languages.original_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

traits.locale_text: «Las familias nobles malgastan energía y tiempo en luchas por el poder cuando deberían centrarse en reforzar su poder militar y la fe sagrada».

languages.text: 「貴族家はエネルギーと時間をくだらない権力争いに費やしている。軍事力と聖なる信仰心を高めるべき時だというのに」
languages.original_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

traits.locale_text: 「貴族家はエネルギーと時間をくだらない権力争いに費やしている。軍事力と聖なる信仰心を高めるべき時だというのに」

languages.text: "Adlige Familien investieren Zeit und Energie in lächerliche Machtkämpfe, statt sich darauf zu konzentrieren, ihre militärische Macht und den heiligen Glauben zu stärken."
languages.original_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

traits.locale_text: "Adlige Familien investieren Zeit und Energie in lächerliche Machtkämpfe, statt sich darauf zu konzentrieren, ihre militärische Macht und den heiligen Glauben zu stärken."

languages.original_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

languages.text: "Soylu aileler, askerî güçlerini ve kutsal inançlarını güçlendirmeye odaklanmaları gereken zamanda enerji ve zamanlarını, saçma güç rekabetlerine harcıyor."
languages.original_text: "Noble families spend energy and time on ridiculous power struggles when they should be focused on strengthening their military might and the holy faith."

traits.locale_text: "Soylu aileler, askerî güçlerini ve kutsal inançlarını güçlendirmeye odaklanmaları gereken zamanda enerji ve zamanlarını, saçma güç rekabetlerine harcıyor."
